name: First Day at Tony's
description:
This game was made in 48 hours for the GDS game jam 2022 :)

Right Click to inspect notes
Left Click to pick up and drag toppings/notes

Today is your first day at Tony's Pizzeria. The only pizza where customers write their own orders. Your job is to properly complete their pizza orders in a timely manner. If you can figure out what the hell they're asking for that is.

Creators of the pizza pasta pie:

Marcus Kuffner: Team Lead, Programmer

Kidane Gabay: Lead Artist, Programmer plugging my site

Ryan Liberty: Composer, Sound Design linktree

Liam Carney: Composer, Sound Design linktree

Abdul Fallah: Programmer

Sera Shkut: Artist
